DECLARE @CustomerTable TABLE ( TransactionNumber INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, ID INT NOT NULL )
INSERT INTO @CustomerTable ( ID ) SELECT A.ID FROM MembershipManage.dbo.Customer A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (@UserNo = '' OR A.UserNo LIKE '%'+ @UserNo +'%') AND (@Name = '' OR A.Name LIKE '%'+ @Name +'%') AND (@Sex IS NULL OR A.Sex = @Sex) AND Status = 1 ORDER BY A.InDate DESC
SELECT @TotalCount = @@ROWCOUNT
;WITH CTE AS( SELECT ID FROM @CustomerTable WHERE TransactionNumber > @PageIndex * @PageSize AND TransactionNumber <= (@PageIndex + 1) * @PageSize )
SELECT A.ID ,B.UserNo ,B.Sex ,B.InDate ,B.InUser ,B.Name ,ISNULL(C.Amount,0) AS Amount ,B.ParentID AS ParentCustomerID ,R.Amount AS RebateAmount ,D.Name AS ParentCustomerName ,B.InDate ,B.InUser FROM CTE A INNER JOIN MembershipManage.dbo.Customer B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN MembershipManage.dbo.CustomerAmount C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.ID = C.CustomerID LEFT JOIN MembershipManage.dbo.Customer D WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.ID = B.ParentID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(Amount) AS Amount,CustomerID FROM MembershipManage.dbo.CustomerRebate GROUP BY CustomerID ) R ON R.CustomerID = A.ID
